name: Event Breakout
description:
In this game, you get to transform Google Calender into an ATARI Breakout-esque video game! Set aside your own plans and have some fun destroying other plans with a volatile ball and paddle!

Types of events:

  • Light blue: 1 hit
  • Yellow: 2 hits
  • Orange: 3 hits
  • Pink: 4 hits
  • Dark Blue: 5 hits

Events that are "repeating" (has a blue border on the left) are shielded! They can take an extra hit!

Special events:

  • Green: return the ball to the paddle
  • Purple: teleports the ball to another linked purple event
  • Red: damages nearby events when hit! very volatile.

All-day events (that appear at the very top):

  • Blue: increase paddle size
  • Red: increase ball speed
  • Green: adds another ball into the scene
